2d7b5f50-42a6-412a-be22-052f2c0b0740.name: host_name
2d7b5f50-42a6-412a-be22-052f2c0b0740.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'host_name') AS host_name
FROM om_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE host_name LIKE '%gpu%'
GROUP BY host_name

widgets.description: The queue size of pending I/O operations.
widgets.title: Queue size
